meanings.definition: A small dish of food or a drink taken before a meal to stimulate one's appetite.
meanings.sent1: The appetiser of olives and cheese made us excited for the main course.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious appetiser of shrimp cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The appetiser of chips and salsa was so good, we almost forgot about the main meal.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an appetiser, making me eager for more conversation.
meanings.sent5: The appetiser of fresh bread and butter was a delightful start to the meal.

meanings.definition: Something that arouses a desire or interest.
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel was an appetiser, leaving me eager to read more.
meanings.sent2: The movie trailer acted as a great appetiser for the upcoming film.
meanings.sent3: The appetiser of a teaser clip made everyone excited for the full video release.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was like an appetiser, drawing people in to see more of his talent.
meanings.sent5: The appetiser of a sneak peek at the new product got customers interested in the launch.
